{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Industrial Human Machine Interface Board |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://beagleboard.org/play |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = BeagleBoard |model = BeaglePlay |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Texas Instruments;Sitara AM625;XAM6254ATCGGAALW; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.4 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Kingston;EMMC16G-TB29; |flash1size = 16 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR4 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4AAG165WA-BCWE; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Texas Instruments;DP83TD510E; |eth3chip = Realtek;RTL8211F; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 10MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 34:08:E1 |oui = 68:E7:4A
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2021.01;; |stockos = Linux;5.10.153;Debian bullseye;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 2.0, MikroBus, Grove, QWIIC, Micro SD Card slot, HDMI 1.3 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = <!-- DC Amps --> |pwr_conn = USB (Type-C) Female
|serial = yes,, 3-pin header,, populated,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 10-pad header,, TAG-CONNECT
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 5.2 LE, ZigBee, 6LoWPAN, Thread, Micro SD Card slot, HDMI 1.3, LVDS, MIPI CSI, mikroBUS, Grove, QWIIC, PoDL, RTC w/ battery |addchip = I2C RTC;TI;BQ32002;;1;,,, SP3T Antenna Switch;Skyworks;SKY13317-373LF;;1;,,, 32Kbit I2C EEPROM;Fremont Micro Devices;FT24C32A;;1;,,, Integrated PMIC for ARM Cortex-A53 & FPGAs;TI;TPS65219;;1;,,, 2 Channel 200-500ksps 10-Bit A/D Converter;TI;ADC102S051;;1;,,, Low Power Single Channel HDMI Transmitter;iTE;IT66121FN;;1;,,, Dual Buffer and Driver with 3-State Outputs;TI;SN74LVC2G241DCU;;1;,,, Current-Limit Switch for USB Host Port;TI;TPD3S014;;1;,,, 5V Flat-Clamp Surge Protection Device;TI;TVS0500;;2;,,, 5V eFuse w/ Precision Adj Current Limit;TI;TPS25200;;1;,,, 2.5-5.5V Input, 4A Step-Down Converter;TI;TLV62595;;1;,,, 5.5V, 2A On-Resistance Load Switch;TI;TPS22918;;1;,,, 500mA Adjustable LDO;TI;TLV758P;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = 192.168.8.1 |defaultlogin = debian |defaultpass = temppwd |defaultssid = BeaglePlay-XXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^BeaglePlay-[A-F0-9]{4}$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = SeeedStudio |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 02/2023 |estprice = 99 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Texas Instruments WL18MODGI |rad1modif = SDIO/UART |rad1chip1 = Texas Instruments;WL1807; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 300/300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad2modif = <!-- Radio Module Interface Type, Leave blank for none --> |rad2chip1cpu = <!-- true, --> |rad2chip1 = Texas Instruments;CC1352P7; |rad2chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad2chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = <!-- Number of transmit radio chains, Leave blank if unknown --> |rad2rxchains = <!-- Number of receive radio chains, Leave blank if unknown --> |rad2sstreams = <!-- Number of spatial data streams, Leave blank if unknown --> |rad2stand = ZigBee, Bluetooth |rad2freq = <!-- 2.4 or 5 or 6, Frequency band(s) of this radio -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :Model/Brand - [[BeagleBoard BeaglePlay]] ([[BeagleBoard]].org BeaglePlay)
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Texas Instruments]] ''Sitara'' AM625 (XAM6254ATCGGAALW) :Quad Core ARM (Cortex-A53) @1.4GHz, 1x ARM (Cortex-M4F) @400MHz <!-- :1x Dual Core Programmable Real-Time Unit and Industrial Communication SubSystem (@333MHz) --> *GPU: PowerVR Rogue 3D (OpenGL ES3.1, Vulkan 1.2) :VPU (2048×1080 @60fps) *Storage: 16GB eMMC, TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *RAM: 2GB (DDR4) SDRAM *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet, 1x 10Mbit single-pair Ethernet (SPE) :w/ 5V/250mA power over data line (PoDL) with RJ11 jack *Wi-Fi: [[TI]] WL1807 (WL18MODGI) 802.11abgn (2.4/5GHz) 2T2R :[[TI]] CC1352P7 M4 + M0 MCU Bluetooth LE/Sub-GHz (802.15.4) *USB: 1x USB 2.0 port, 1x USB (Type-C) for power :and superspeed dual-role controller *Power Source: USB (Type-C) port
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.hackster.io/news/beagleboard-org-launches-the-adaptable-open-source-beagleplay-and-low-cost-beagleconnect-freedom-4901528a0049 ''BeagleBoard.org Launches the Adaptable, Open Source BeaglePlay'' on '''hackster.io'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2023/03/09/beagleplay-a-99-texas-instruments-am625-industrial-sbc-with-plenty-of-communication-and-expansion-options/ ''BeaglePlay – A $99 Texas Instruments AM625 industrial SBC'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/beagleboard-org-launches-new-embedded-products/ ''BeagleBoard.org launches new embedded products'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
